WorkItem.Description:
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.
== Version: 4.1.1.0
 
 
== Error Message ==
   at Rawr.DPSWarr.FuryRotation.SettleAll(Single totalPercTimeLost, Single rageUsedByMaintenance, Single percTimeU20, Single availRageO20, Single& percFailRageO20)

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
When trying to equip 1h weapons or choose SMF as a talent, errors are produced.  
Can be duplicated by making a warrior from scratch, choosing the default fury build, and adding a point to SMF then removing a point from TG.
Tried in 4.1.01, 4.1.02, and 4.1.03.

Comments.Message: We need the error message from the latest version, 4.1.1 is reporting it wrong
